body.name: CLEANHOME Collapsible Mop Bucket on Wheels for Industrial Mop Cleaning, Side Press Wringer Combo Commercial Cleaning Caddy Plastic, Suitable for Wet mop,Sponge Mop,Grey
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 59 mins
features: Fits All Size Sponge Mop and Wet Mops: Large capacity mop bucket and removable cleaning basket, suitable for cleaning various household mops, commercial mops, and industrial mops.
Collapsible Mop Bucket: The wringer mop bucket can be folded when not in use to save the space. It’s convenient for household cleaning or commercial cleaning work.
Mop Bucket with Wheels: The wheels at the bottom of the mop bucket can move the bucket during cleaning without having to lift it up. It’s suitable for large area cleaning work or weak elderly people.
Mop Bucket with Wringer: This mop bucket equipped with a squeeze basket. Squeeze the mop dry without twisting it by hand. .Avoid contacting your hands with sewage.
Drain Design:The wringer mop bucket has a drain below. Just opening the piston allows the sewage to be poured out without laboriously dumping the bucket.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brand Story CLEANHOME: Have an independent factory dedicated to the production of cleaning products for 35 years.We have a professional R&D and design team.We constantly improve and update our products based on feedback from our customers. If you have any questions in the use of the product, please feel free to tell us.

Fits All Size Sponge Mop and Wet Mops: Large capacity mop bucket and removable cleaning basket, suitable for cleaning various household mops, commercial mops, and industrial mops. Collapsible Mop Bucket: The wringer mop bucket can be folded when not in use to save the space. It’s convenient for household cleaning or commercial cleaning work. Mop Bucket with Wheels: The wheels at the bottom of the mop bucket can move the bucket during cleaning without having to lift it up. It’s suitable for large area cleaning work or weak elderly people. Mop Bucket with Wringer: This mop bucket equipped with a squeeze basket. Squeeze the mop dry without twisting it by hand. .Avoid contacting your hands with sewage. Drain Design:The wringer mop bucket has a drain below. Just opening the piston allows the sewage to be poured out without laboriously dumping the bucket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love that is compact but sturdy. Does the job well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for quick jobs
reviews.reviewText: I use it with a full size cotton mop for mopping my cement patio. Better for me than the large expensive mop bucket on wheels. I have both and I rather use this smaller version.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's ok, it's a sturdy plastic/silicone type material. I was just trying to find a larger bucket for my mop with a strainer. This almost works, but not quite. I haven't measured how much water I've put in it, I'd say it easily holds 3-5 gallons. The problems I have with it, I can't get it to totally expand open and stay open. It sags down a couple notches. I've pulled on it, stretched, and just can't figure it out. I'll get it to do it, but then once I set it down it sags again.The other issue is dipping the mop head in to get wet. It's a tight fit. I don't know the exact mop I'm using; it's a Rubbermaid with yellow plastic clip that you slide a washable mop head on and click it on then twist a center cap down over to hold it on. I've got two different mop heads, one a yarn one and the other a microfiber. The microfiber definitely fits a bit better since it's not as wide. And then the drain basket, same thing, tight fit and microfiber one fits a tad better. Neither mop heads or the mop are considered a commercial type.Other than that, it's not unusable, but it just needs a bit of a work around from me to make it work. It's decent quality/materials, lightweight. Not sure which type of mop this is made for, don't recall seeing it in the description anywhere. Due to the issues above, I'd say it's about 3 1/2-4 stars for a rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like that it folds up so that it can be put away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It'd a mop bucket!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the idea of this mop bucket but it's just poorly made. For example assembling and removing the strainer is a hassle and the plug on the side is flimsy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice bucket for storing
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice bucket to use then store in small area. It rolls. Lightweight. The only downside is the place to wring the mop. This could use some improvements. A must have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After 6 weeks of use I am not happy with the product. The ball rollers rusted, the strainer can not be removed to use a just a bucket, and it has tipped over spilling twice.
